xuiImage
directive in module xui

Description

XUI wrapper for images.

Usage

as element:
<xui-image
       image="{string}"
       [size="{string}"]
       [float="{string}"]
       [margin="{string}"]>
</xui-image>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
imagestring

The image to be rendered. Able to handle custom paths and default graphics library. Supported images: "sw-logo", "no-search-results", "no-alerts", "no-data-to-show", "ok-robot", "404-robot", "500-robot", "empty-dashboard".

size
(optional)
string

Width, specified in "px" or "%", calculated from the parent block (height calculates automatically based on origin image ratio).

(default: 70% of parent block)

float
(optional)
string

Options are "left", "right", or "centered".

(default: none)

margin
(optional)
string

Options are "small" or "large".

(default: "large")

Example
